Name: hereditary spherocytosis
Definition: A congenital hemolytic anemia characterized by the production of red blood cells with a sphere shape

Name: congenital dyserythropoietic anemia
Definition: A congenital hemolytic anemia characterized by ineffective erythropoiesis

Name: obsolete acute pyelonephritis with lesion of renal medullary necrosis
Definition: A congenital hemolytic anemia characterized by ineffective erythropoiesis

Name: hemoglobinopathy
Definition: A chronic lymphocytic leukemia that is characterized by over production of B cells (lymphocytes) by the bone marrow where the B cells appear hairy under a microscope.

Name: congenital nonspherocytic hemolytic anemia
Definition: A chronic lymphocytic leukemia that is characterized by over production of B cells (lymphocytes) by the bone marrow where the B cells appear hairy under a microscope.
